title: Azure AI Developer Hackathon
description:
Ready to take your AI skills to the next level?
The Azure AI Developer Hackathon offers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience building intelligent applications on the Azure platform, supercharged by the power of GitHub Copilot.  
 
 Sign up for the free tier of GitHub Copilot 
 Pay as you go or try Azure free for up to 30 days. *Note: See Resources tab for opportunities for Students and Startup Founders to access free credits. 
 Brush up on the skills needed for this hackathon through
